title: FT: Bull Durham EPDG SGC 30 - NO LONGER AVAIL
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Bull Durham EPDG SGC 30 - NO LONGER AVAIL
posts.post_content:
Have this Durham EPDG dupe available for trade.  Getting close to the next goal and hoping someone can help me out. Willing to mix cash into the deal either way. I’m not condition sensitive but would like as complete a back as possible.

He isn’t the prettiest but he’s a tough get. A PSA 1.5 recently sold for $300.

Have a few other raw EPDG examples available to trade also....just shoot me a PM.

Looking for the following EPDGs to trade for:
Bowerman
Cobb bat off
Geyer
Howell (hands waist)
Hummel
Keeler with bat
McGraw (Glove hip)
Scott
Happy Smith
Tinker (bat off)




[url=https://flic.kr/p/2h4Y5UU][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/48615293116_878050b8c9_c.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2h4Y5UZ][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/48615293121_9566251088_c.jpg[/img][/url]

Is that the last of the one's you need to complete your subset? I was surprised to see what the Durham has sold for. Then I looked up a couple of mine and I was shocked. Especially my PSA 4 Keeler with bat. Sorry but not for sale or trade. Just for your reference, I also have a Geyer SGC 55.

[quote name="Ronnie73" post=1911349]Is that the last of the one's you need to complete your subset? I was surprised to see what the Durham has sold for. Then I looked up a couple of mine and I was shocked. Especially my PSA 4 Keeler with bat. Sorry but not for sale or trade. Just for your reference, I also have a Geyer SGC 55.[/QUOTE]

I’m needing about 19 at this point but these are the key ones I’m targeting next.  Some of the other ones are easier and I’ll just wait until they come up....so I didn’t include them.

Gonna ping you on Messenger with your needs list.  Have a couple others available.
